data.description:
Anti-tank rifles are bipod and tripod mounted rifles designed to penetrate armored vehicles. In Vehicle Combat, the anti-tank rounds do full damage against unarmored vehicles and 1/2 damage against vehicles with the Reinforced Hull (x1) Modification, but are ineffective against more heavily armored vehicles.

Examples include the British Boys, the Polish Wz.35, and the German PanzerbuÌˆchse.
